title: Do we need projector along with interactive whiteboard to make it work? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technically, one doesn’t need a projector to make the interactive whiteboard work. The interactive whiteboard is connected to the computer using the USB. Connector and works as an I/O device. The projector is connected to the computer to display the images on the interactive whiteboard to let the user, touch & select the right tools & display the annotations made on the interactive whiteboard.
